Cruiser Dual 2 Pro

4+4MP Camera | Blue & Red Warning Light Aurora Low-light Imaging Technology Wide View Dual Lens | IMOU Algorithm Mart: Algo Play

Key Features:

  • 1/2.9”4 Megapixel Progressive CMOS
  • 4MP (2560x 1440)
  • Night Vision: 30m(98ft) Distance
  • 3.6mm Fixed Lens
  • Field of View: 85°(H), 45°(V),100°(D)
  • 0~260°Pan & 0~25°Tilt
  • 4 fill-in lights (two white lights and two infrared lights)
  • 1/2.9”4 Megapixel Progressive CMOS
  • 4MP (2560x 1440)
  • Night Vision: 30m(98ft) Distance
  • 3.6mm Fixed Lens
  • ield of View: 85°(H), 45°(V),100°(D)
